businessProfile.name: Padeli's Street Greek
businessProfile.address: 30 W Broadway, Salt Lake City, UT 84111, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 30 W Broadway, Salt Lake City, UT 84111, USA

reviews.text: This is THE WORST Greek my husband and I have ever had. I don't know if it's because we came at the end of the day or if it's because it's just been sitting out all day. The pita bread was hard and stale. It was so bad I couldn't bare another bite. The lamb/beef meat was also hard and cold and flavorless. I had some of the fries from my children's plate and that was alright. It was hard to hear the person behind the counter when I was ordering, and thats with barely any people in the place. Definitely don't recommend this place and we'll never be coming back.
I don't love the toppings limit for the price but it was delicious!  Definitely go with tziki the hummus was just okay

I've been a regular to-go customer for at least a year. Frequently, things I order are missing ingredients. No huge deal. But today, I was so disgusted to discover my half and half bowl had some sort of yellow sauce all over it that tasted like curry. I looked on the menu and learned that the only thing it could be is mustard. YUCK! On top of the mustard as if to "hide" it was the actual sauce I ordered (creamy sriracha). SO that meant that not only did I get mustard on my bowl (eww) but it basically had double sauce on it. It was like a soup. Completely inedible. So gross!! Sad to say but I won't be ordering here again. To the staff if you mess something up I recommend simply remaking it instead of sending it to one of your loyal customers.

Quality, fresh Greek food. Options like going to Qdoba... but Greek style. I had the bowl (sound familiar? ) with rice, garbanzo beans, lamb beef kabob... plus pita, toppings and sauce.  Watching them use a caulking gun to squirt out the sauce was a bit unnerving...  Make it a combo and you get a side and drink. Plenty to eat and a nice alternative to a burger place. Customer operated soda machine takes a while to make a selection from many, many drink options and a line quickly forms. Most first time customers were a bit confused ordering as I was. If you don't know what it is or includes... ask. Menu on board is not very clear for new customers even if you have been to Greece.
Seating could be more inviting like it is in Greece rather than a subway sandwich place. They do have limited outside seating for nice weather.
Competition across the street probably keeps them doing their best.
Greek music playing was a novel idea.
Overall good food and I would go back... after trying across the street just to see what that is all about and make another review üôÑ

You guys. I don't even know where to start. Run, don't walk, to Padeli's Street Greek in Lehi. This is my new favorite place to eat. Everything, EVERYTHING, was so incredible. You have to grab the pita chips and feta dip, I LOVED my spanakopita and the village salad with chicken...top of the line. My falafel gyro with Sriracha sauce was next level. If you love fresh, flavorful, healthy food, this place will win your heart. Seriously, my new favorite place to eat. Bring on fast Sunday. I'm enjoying the sun and well-fed. #padelisstreetgreek #Lehi #lfthx #organicad @padelisstreetgreek

editorial_summary.overview: No-frills joint focusing on traditional Greek gyros, salads, wraps & sides plus imported sodas.

recentReviews.text: Was very disappointed in the portion size. Barely any chicken with no option for more chicken.
Awesome. Huge portions! I had lunch and dinner in a $12 wrap
The restaurant needs to be cleaned a little better but the food is absolutely delicious üòã.

I got the greek salad which tasted amazing and was exactly what i expected, but the workers behind the counter were hard to communicate with. I also chose not to dine in because the tables and floors looked somewhat dirty. Also, after reading other peoples reviews im sure the only reason they got my order right was because i was actually inside the restraunt. Overall, id say i might go here again if i was in the area already, but since theres better greek restraunts in SLC it wouldnt be my first choice

This is THE WORST Greek my husband and I have ever had. I don't know if it's because we came at the end of the day or if it's because it's just been sitting out all day. The pita bread was hard and stale. It was so bad I couldn't bare another bite. The lamb/beef meat was also hard and cold and flavorless. I had some of the fries from my children's plate and that was alright. It was hard to hear the person behind the counter when I was ordering, and thats with barely any people in the place. Definitely don't recommend this place and we'll never be coming back.

I've been a regular to-go customer for at least a year. Frequently, things I order are missing ingredients. No huge deal. But today, I was so disgusted to discover my half and half bowl had some sort of yellow sauce all over it that tasted like curry. I looked on the menu and learned that the only thing it could be is mustard. YUCK! On top of the mustard as if to "hide" it was the actual sauce I ordered (creamy sriracha). SO that meant that not only did I get mustard on my bowl (eww) but it basically had double sauce on it. It was like a soup. Completely inedible. So gross!! Sad to say but I won't be ordering here again. To the staff if you mess something up I recommend simply remaking it instead of sending it to one of your loyal customers.

The gyro meat was pre-sliced, sitting in a warming tray, so it was dry as a desert. The tzatziki sauce was bland. The rice lacked flavor. The only reason they get two stars is that the veggies appeared fresh.

The people working there were nice and helpful.
Passable gyro though oversauced and overseasoned. Incredibly nice staff.

Tried Padeli‚Äôs via Uber Eats and it was sooo good. Got the chicken wrap combo and it was delicious with plenty leftover. Wouldn‚Äôt get the wrap again only because it fell apart, no worries tho because that made a great topping for the fries. Will definitely be back.

detailedReviews.author: Dustyn Adams
detailedReviews.text: Was very disappointed in the portion size. Barely any chicken with no option for more chicken.

detailedReviews.author: Mike S
detailedReviews.text: Awesome. Huge portions! I had lunch and dinner in a $12 wrap

detailedReviews.author: Jantel VanOrden
detailedReviews.text: The restaurant needs to be cleaned a little better but the food is absolutely delicious üòã.

detailedReviews.author: Aneesa Fernandez
detailedReviews.text: I got the greek salad which tasted amazing and was exactly what i expected, but the workers behind the counter were hard to communicate with. I also chose not to dine in because the tables and floors looked somewhat dirty. Also, after reading other peoples reviews im sure the only reason they got my order right was because i was actually inside the restraunt. Overall, id say i might go here again if i was in the area already, but since theres better greek restraunts in SLC it wouldnt be my first choice

detailedReviews.author: Maricela Jaramillo
detailedReviews.text: Love the gyros from here!!

detailedReviews.author: Krista Clark
detailedReviews.text: This is THE WORST Greek my husband and I have ever had. I don't know if it's because we came at the end of the day or if it's because it's just been sitting out all day. The pita bread was hard and stale. It was so bad I couldn't bare another bite. The lamb/beef meat was also hard and cold and flavorless. I had some of the fries from my children's plate and that was alright. It was hard to hear the person behind the counter when I was ordering, and thats with barely any people in the place. Definitely don't recommend this place and we'll never be coming back.

detailedReviews.author: Lara Grant
detailedReviews.text: I've been a regular to-go customer for at least a year. Frequently, things I order are missing ingredients. No huge deal. But today, I was so disgusted to discover my half and half bowl had some sort of yellow sauce all over it that tasted like curry. I looked on the menu and learned that the only thing it could be is mustard. YUCK! On top of the mustard as if to "hide" it was the actual sauce I ordered (creamy sriracha). SO that meant that not only did I get mustard on my bowl (eww) but it basically had double sauce on it. It was like a soup. Completely inedible. So gross!! Sad to say but I won't be ordering here again. To the staff if you mess something up I recommend simply remaking it instead of sending it to one of your loyal customers.

detailedReviews.author: Benjamin Finnell
detailedReviews.text:
The gyro meat was pre-sliced, sitting in a warming tray, so it was dry as a desert. The tzatziki sauce was bland. The rice lacked flavor. The only reason they get two stars is that the veggies appeared fresh.

The people working there were nice and helpful.

detailedReviews.author: Nilesh Patel
detailedReviews.text: Passable gyro though oversauced and overseasoned. Incredibly nice staff.

detailedReviews.author: Will Doyle
detailedReviews.text: Tried Padeli‚Äôs via Uber Eats and it was sooo good. Got the chicken wrap combo and it was delicious with plenty leftover. Wouldn‚Äôt get the wrap again only because it fell apart, no worries tho because that made a great topping for the fries. Will definitely be back.

detailedReviews.author: Brielle Hansen
detailedReviews.text: I don't love the toppings limit for the price but it was delicious!  Definitely go with tziki the hummus was just okay

detailedReviews.author: John-Michael Smith
detailedReviews.text: I love Greek food. My wife is Greek. The lamb and beef was cold and dry. Seemed to have been sitting for hours. Hopefully they see this and ensure even during slow times the quality is not impaired.

detailedReviews.author: John
detailedReviews.text: Best, most authentic gyro in Utah. Love that they put fries in it just like in Athens.

detailedReviews.author: Brigitte Todd
detailedReviews.text: Food was so yummy and was delivered in a timely fashion. It was great! Will order from them again.

detailedReviews.author: Kristina Marks
detailedReviews.text: Great food and prices!

detailedReviews.author: N P
detailedReviews.text: A Greek chipotle? Yes please! Solid portions (especially the fries) and flavorful food. Quick friendly service.

detailedReviews.author: Asim Raja
detailedReviews.text: Everything was up to par! Other than the gyro meat, which was over cooked and over greased.. the meat was not fresh.

detailedReviews.author: Brian Dunkel
detailedReviews.text: Padeli's absolutely delivered for me, literally and figuratively. I had Padeli's cater three large lunches for me last week and the food was excellent, delivery was on time, and everything was included. The attendees of all three lunches asked where the food was from and exclaimed that it was great. When leaving town, I stopped by the restaurant to have lunch myself and to thank the staff for their efforts. I highly recommend Padeli's for dine-in, to go, and catering.

detailedReviews.author: Pablo Moncada
detailedReviews.text: The food is great!, but they are always closed

detailedReviews.author: Ryan Jones
detailedReviews.text: Actual menu was $2-3 more than what I found on the listing. Good food, but limited to only 3 toppings (vegetable, cheese, etc) which was a disappointment

detailedReviews.author: Wa Qas
detailedReviews.text: The beef gyro was okay. I was expecting more flavor.

detailedReviews.author: Eban Beltran
detailedReviews.text: Decent place. I think the sauce could have more bite to it, but other than that the food was good.

detailedReviews.author: Alexander Bybee
detailedReviews.text: Despite there not being a line, I felt rushed and the food was casually thrown together. Tasted good but not great.

detailedReviews.author: Michell Gomez (Chelle)
detailedReviews.text: I think the food was great but the service and the attitude of the staff was terrible. I took a little longer because it was my first time visiting and I was looking at the menu but that was a problem apparently

detailedReviews.author: Eva Trinh
detailedReviews.text: Cute casual restaurant with good quality fresh veggies and nicely grilled pita. The chicken and spanakopita is okay.

detailedReviews.author: J Go
detailedReviews.text: Food was average. The floors were sticky and none of the tables were clean and I came in shortly after they opened.  There were flies around the seating area.  Wonder if the kitchen is clean for how poor it was today.

detailedReviews.author: Sue J
detailedReviews.text: Address was wrong on web page. Food unremarkable.

detailedReviews.author: Leo Daboin
detailedReviews.text: The food is great and the portions are even better. Definitely one of my go tos whenever I‚Äôm downtown. Most underrated restaurant downtown.

detailedReviews.author: Kumiko Kitagawa
detailedReviews.text: Love their Padeli's Gyro! So good!

detailedReviews.author: niko pix
detailedReviews.text: We ordered (via DoorDash) Lamb & Beef Gyro and was excited about it since this is our first time trying their food. Generous portion of meat but the meats are super dry and tzatziki doesn't taste or not even close to tzatziki sauce, it was just a yogurt üòü. The Baklava was ok but definitely not freshly baked. For almost $30 meal for 2, I would expect at least a decent dish. To give prospect customers a comparison, Arby's gyro is definitely way better than Padeli's gyro in terms of taste and freshness.

detailedReviews.author: Thomas Paxinos
detailedReviews.text: Amazing food, can‚Äôt understand why their hours are listed wrong and how they could be closed during the erarly evening. I legit am in disbelief they are closed on the weekends and after 4pm. How? You‚Äôre losing a customer to your competition downtown. An added comment to the owner besides to keep the place open later is to be sure that the servers stir and cycle the gyro meat sitting as the meat on top as it goes stale and ruins the bowls.

detailedReviews.author: John Sutton
detailedReviews.text: Great tasting food.  Generous portion sizes.  Nothing worse than a gyro with too little meat but they stuff theirs well.  You can customize your toppings on the gyro or salad.  The only disappointment was they have one of those drink dispensers that mix hundreds of drink combinations but they aren't all available..mostly coke/diet coke and a few flavor options (fanta, sprite) but they dont have all the Minute Maid lemonade and fruit drinks and not many low calorie options.

detailedReviews.author: Jay D
detailedReviews.text: Very good gyro platters.

detailedReviews.author: Erik Remley
detailedReviews.text: Greek food Chipotle style. One of my favorite songs for lunch. Can't go wrong with the gyro.

detailedReviews.author: Sydney Holcomb
detailedReviews.text: Chicken was not good and I ended up picking out each piece. Used to be cheaper but prices have gone up and I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs worth it now. For the same price there are better options elsewhere.

detailedReviews.author: Tom Ericksen
detailedReviews.text: Just a darn good gyro!

detailedReviews.author: Y K
detailedReviews.text: This is the saltiest salad I've ever had in my life... I've never tried any Mediterranian food in my life so maybe this is how it should taste, but it was saltier the the actual salt itself.

detailedReviews.author: Julien Plouffe
detailedReviews.text: This spot is amazing! Fresh olives, fresh meats

detailedReviews.author: Josh Francis
detailedReviews.text: Excellent food and great serving sizes.

detailedReviews.author: Rachel Howden
detailedReviews.text: Great fries. We got the kids bowls and it was a good size portion. Menu is not super intuitive but food was decent. Food was pretty good for price value.

detailedReviews.author: Dona Lobes
detailedReviews.text: Had gyros. Meat was flavorful, but kind of sparse. Cucumber sauce is delicious! Hubby had fries which were horrible. All we tasted was grease. We are from Chicago and have yet to find a Greek restaurant that is even close to what we were used to, but this place is almost comparable. As usual in SLC, parking is an issue.

detailedReviews.author: Melissa Allen
detailedReviews.text: Most authentic Greek food I‚Äôve had besides food in actual Greece! I‚Äôve been a couple times and grew up with Greek family friends and I feel confident saying this. The food is GOOD!

detailedReviews.author: Gordon Chow
detailedReviews.text: My favorite food! good price delicious ingredients and really good lemon rice.

detailedReviews.author: Curtis Lloyd
detailedReviews.text: I had this delivered to work.  It was GREAT!!!  The Spicy loaded fries are very good and a meal in it self.  I ordered a wrap as well, I'll save the wrap for another day, I could not possibly eat them both at once.  I will order again and try new things.  Well done great food!!

detailedReviews.author: Lesley B
detailedReviews.text: Such a surprise, good food good hearty portions. I'll come back again.

detailedReviews.author: KHM1730
detailedReviews.text: Excellent food, good prices

detailedReviews.author: Lynley Golden
detailedReviews.text: This was the best Greek food that I‚Äôve ever had!

detailedReviews.author: Julia Parker
detailedReviews.text: Freshest, most authentic Greek food you‚Äôll find. Not to mention great prices and huge portions. If I could give it 7 stars I would.

detailedReviews.author: Daniel Andrade
detailedReviews.text: Came here near closing and the ingredients were all in stock still and tasted fresh! Also, great flavor combinations and portions. Best part is that it‚Äôs a better value than other build-your-own restaurants like chipotle imo. Recommend the half/half bowl

detailedReviews.author: D Buck
detailedReviews.text: The food is fresh - and always ready when they say it will be. My kids even love it!

detailedReviews.author: Andrew Suh
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôm usually a very big fan of this place but I had a disappointing experience tonight I actually wondered if I had the right place because it looked like they had reduced their portions by half, before one order filled me up but this time I was left wanting. I‚Äôm going to give them one last try because I‚Äôm hoping this was just a bad day but if this is how their portions stay I‚Äôll have to find a new place for greek

detailedReviews.author: saige salazar
detailedReviews.text: Really good Greek food, fresh and delicious

detailedReviews.author: Jonathan Silva
detailedReviews.text: It's a spicy meatball üëè

detailedReviews.author: Solomon A. Kalapala
detailedReviews.text: Their bowls are delicious and packed with flavor. I was recommended to try out Padeli's from a friend on social media. Their service is great and the options are amazing!

detailedReviews.author: Zachary Larkin
detailedReviews.text: Fast, delicious, and great value! The lamb has so much flavor!

detailedReviews.author: Natalynn Butcher
detailedReviews.text: They didn‚Äôt have the traditional shaved meat, it was chunks of meat supposedly pork, it was so dry like jerky and the white sauce had no Flavor  to it all.

detailedReviews.author: Cassie Baldonado
detailedReviews.text: This place usto be wonderful when it was Greek  Slovaki but now it's horrible. They don't have a good selection and one choice for kids.

detailedReviews.author: Paul Johnston
detailedReviews.text: Awesome food and I haven't had one messed up order!

detailedReviews.author: David Strahan
detailedReviews.text: Great gyros and great fries!

detailedReviews.author: Erin Olson
detailedReviews.text: Amazing food and awesome prices. I love the bowl‚Äôs! This will be a regular of mine from now on.

detailedReviews.author: Ali Moeinvaziri
detailedReviews.text: The food is good , but check your order to be complete. They charge, but don‚Äôt include everything in order. When you‚Äôre home, it‚Äôs too late. I called, but they were try to blame it on someone else. Something like, it wasn‚Äôt me who took care of the order, that guy is gone, we check... that was too late for me anyways. I paid over $50 for four meals, they wrapped a special for four which is $20 less. Yet, they pocketed the extra! Check your order right there; they‚Äôre not to be trusted with your order.

detailedReviews.author: Jared Merz
detailedReviews.text: Great place to get a gyro, or a number of other Greek favorites. Decently priced and quick. Try the roasted pepper feta dip with pita chips, its fantastic!

detailedReviews.author: Kate Ostler
detailedReviews.text: I love this place! The toppings seem fresh, the service is speedy and the flavors are so good for fast casual Greek. I wish I lived closer so I could enjoy more Padeli's.

detailedReviews.author: Marnie Dale
detailedReviews.text: I am in LOVE with this place!!! the food is always amazingly good, fresh and humongous portions!! Thank you!!

detailedReviews.author: Cameron Connolly
detailedReviews.text: Life changing. That's all I can say. Amazing quality. Great staff. Good location. We need more Padelis Street Greek

detailedReviews.author: jesse martinez
detailedReviews.text: This place never disappoints me. Healthy eating by choice

detailedReviews.author: jeana har
detailedReviews.text: Hands down, best gyro in Utah. I can't get enough of this place! so good

detailedReviews.author: diego sosa
detailedReviews.text: Love this place but the staff has the worst attitude problem. Had to call one of them out for using cleaning supplies and mopping with gloves on, then using those same gloves to make food. Ended up rejecting the food he touched and called him. Don‚Äôt know his name but it‚Äôs the one that looks like Sid from Toy Story

detailedReviews.author: Kyle Ahlstrom
detailedReviews.text: Ordered a curbside pickup but they never came out with it. I was waiting outside for 20-30 mins. The website said it would take an hour so I was waiting for them to tell me it was ready but when I saw them cleaning up to close I went in to check on my order and it had been sitting behind the counter not on the pick up table. The food was fine but cold cuz it had been sitting out. They also forgot a $4 side. The dessert was super small too.

detailedReviews.author: Jeffrey Peterson
detailedReviews.text: Really like Padeli's.  We have gone there frequently as a lunch group and have never gone wrong.  And, more recently, we have had it catered in the office and it was still amazing!

detailedReviews.author: Milli Pichardo
detailedReviews.text: Pretty good food, a nice modern twist in SLC

detailedReviews.author: Roy R.
detailedReviews.text: I super love Padeli's and really want to give them five stars. However, I have seen a horrible trend in their customer service that I'm not a fan of. Almost all of the employees have recently started wearing headphones. I don't have a problem with it when they're in the back, but I'm even seeing it with the people up front. There's nothing more frustrating than having to yell over their music in order for them to hear what it is I'm wanting. It's also extremely rude in general.

detailedReviews.author: Karen Beesley
detailedReviews.text: Had a great experience at Padeli‚Äôs.  There was so much food and the Greek Salad was the best.

detailedReviews.author: Katie Hemingway
detailedReviews.text: Tzatziki was delicious and pita chips were great. I love that they have a Freestyle machine. Meat was a little dry but we came right before dinner rush started so that was probably just unlucky. I would love if they‚Äôd cut their cucumbers in slices. The huge chunks are hard to eat.

detailedReviews.author: Lauren Sain
detailedReviews.text: So the traditional and Padeli original gyro were amazing! The staff was super nice and we felt like we got a ton of great food for the price we paid. :)

detailedReviews.author: John Mabey
detailedReviews.text: Great Greek spot. They fry up your falafels as you order them, which I loved! The portions were HUGE and plenty filling. I also loved my pita bread. It was very fluffy and warm. It was also a great spot to eat, being just up the road from the theater.

detailedReviews.author: Christine Dixon
detailedReviews.text: Delicious gyros! We walked in right before closing but they were so nice and helpful and gave us tons of extra meat!

detailedReviews.author: Codie Bennett
detailedReviews.text: Love how fresh it is! My husband LOVES lamb and beef gyros and we love having somewhere close by to grab them!

detailedReviews.author: Carrie Mikell
detailedReviews.text: I love, LOVE this place. I love that you can get a variety of things for such a reasonable price. Definitely my go to Greek food.

detailedReviews.author: Jayden Budge
detailedReviews.text: This place was amazing! really reasonably priced as well. Wish they didn‚Äôt charge extra for chicken, because the chicken is the best! definitely coming again

detailedReviews.author: Katie Kirk
detailedReviews.text: Great food!

detailedReviews.author: D SZ
detailedReviews.text: Love this place but staff needs to up their customers service. Really rude, and mouthy lately.

detailedReviews.author: Taryn Ray
detailedReviews.text: Food was incredible!

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.0/5 rating from 100 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the generous portions and value for money, as highlighted by the "huge portions" and "solid portions" comments. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The authenticity of the gyros, especially with unique touches like fries in the gyro "just like in Athens," is a standout feature. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
The restaurant's ability to cater large events with excellent food and timely delivery is highly appreciated. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews about food quality and service inconsistencies - review management can address this concern
Cleanliness and ambiance concerns, such as dirty tables and floors - social media marketing can improve this area
Incorrect or outdated online information, such as wrong address and menu pricing - SEO services can solve this visibility issue

positive.author: Mike S
positive.text: Awesome. Huge portions! I had lunch and dinner in a $12 wrap

positive.author: Jantel VanOrden
positive.text: The restaurant needs to be cleaned a little better but the food is absolutely delicious üòã.

positive.author: Aneesa Fernandez
positive.text: I got the greek salad which tasted amazing and was exactly what i expected, but the workers behind the counter were hard to communicate with. I also chose not to dine in because the tables and floors looked somewhat dirty. Also, after reading other peoples reviews im sure the only reason they got my order right was because i was actually inside the restraunt. Overall, id say i might go here again if i was in the area already, but since theres better greek restraunts in SLC it wouldnt be my first choice

neutral.author: Nilesh Patel
neutral.text: Passable gyro though oversauced and overseasoned. Incredibly nice staff.

neutral.author: John-Michael Smith
neutral.text: I love Greek food. My wife is Greek. The lamb and beef was cold and dry. Seemed to have been sitting for hours. Hopefully they see this and ensure even during slow times the quality is not impaired.

neutral.author: Wa Qas
neutral.text: The beef gyro was okay. I was expecting more flavor.

negative.author: Dustyn Adams
negative.text: Was very disappointed in the portion size. Barely any chicken with no option for more chicken.

negative.author: Krista Clark
negative.text: This is THE WORST Greek my husband and I have ever had. I don't know if it's because we came at the end of the day or if it's because it's just been sitting out all day. The pita bread was hard and stale. It was so bad I couldn't bare another bite. The lamb/beef meat was also hard and cold and flavorless. I had some of the fries from my children's plate and that was alright. It was hard to hear the person behind the counter when I was ordering, and thats with barely any people in the place. Definitely don't recommend this place and we'll never be coming back.

negative.author: Lara Grant
negative.text: I've been a regular to-go customer for at least a year. Frequently, things I order are missing ingredients. No huge deal. But today, I was so disgusted to discover my half and half bowl had some sort of yellow sauce all over it that tasted like curry. I looked on the menu and learned that the only thing it could be is mustard. YUCK! On top of the mustard as if to "hide" it was the actual sauce I ordered (creamy sriracha). SO that meant that not only did I get mustard on my bowl (eww) but it basically had double sauce on it. It was like a soup. Completely inedible. So gross!! Sad to say but I won't be ordering here again. To the staff if you mess something up I recommend simply remaking it instead of sending it to one of your loyal customers.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
